data.title: Best Pizza!
data.text: Love ZPizza anywhere but this location is on the Newport Peninsula and has quick access to all the Newport nightlife. Call for delivery or show up at 1am with the rest of the drunks ;)

data.title: Z great pizza
data.text: Zpizza is simple a great Pizza! The pizza types are like no other pizza offerings. Just had the latest creation Carnitas and Avocado, it was spectacular !  Simple stated, if you are looking for traditional pizza this may not the place, not sure what to do? Then go online www.zpizza.com and  be amazed at what zpizza has to offer, look if you are tired of pizza try zpizza it is not another pizza joint.

data.title: Pretty good
data.text: I have other favorites, but Zpizza is pretty good. Nice for a quick slice. See their weekly menu for when they have what pre made slices available. My fav is the BBQ chicken.  They deliver too.

data.title: Pear + Gorgonzola Salad - YUM!
data.text: Popped in for a quick lunch while in the area. The pear + gorgonzola salad was perfectly fresh and delicious. Would go there again in a heartbeat.
